body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Hollingsworth in Clay County on February 17, 1856. Father of Sarah J. Reid, James Reid, and William Reid. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from November 4, 1861, to October 27, 1864.
